name: camel-to-kebab
description: Convert camelCase inputs to kebab-case outputs.

scripts.test-all: npm run test && npm run es-test && npm run dist-test && npm run uglify-test
scripts.build: echo 'Copying source to dist/ directory.' && cp src/camel-to-kebab.js dist/camel-to-kebab.js && echo 'Uglifying source.' && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output dist/camel-to-kebab.min.js src/camel-to-kebab.js && npm run add-uglified-comments
scripts.prepublish: echo 'Building and testing package.' && npm run build && npm run test-all
